name: JRRRRRPG
description:
The game is about a man who got bored of his job and seeks new pleasures in his life. Lead him to his new destiny towards mindscrewing adventures! "If you like it you should put a ring on it..."(If total donations reach to a hunderd bucks, we will port this game to Android phones!)RPG Maker RTP is not needed! Just download and start playing!Credits:Serkan Pekcetin (S3K)Ugurcan Orcun (Kabraxis)Tarik Kaya (Kayabros)Special Thanks:Ayfer Barutcuoglu / Ahmet Kamil Keles / Halil Cosgun
for voiceovers!
A Fuck This Jam entry.
